sentences.en: And whether they play in smoky cellar clubs or spacious concert hall, jazz musicians are drawing record crowds.
sentences.cn: 爵士音乐家们不论是在烟雾弥漫的地下室的俱乐部演奏,还是在豪华宽敞的音乐厅里表演, 都能吸引空前多的听众.

sentences.en: Many of Kuwait's spacious freeways were engineered by W S Atkins.
sentences.cn: 科威特有很多宽阔的高速公路是阿特金斯集团设计建造的。

sentences.en: Our yard is spacious enough for a swimming pool.
sentences.cn: 我们的院子很宽敞,足够建一座游泳池.

sentences.en: The entire team enjoyed hot showers in the spacious surrounds of a new, modern village hall.
sentences.cn: 全队都在新建的现代化村会所的宽敞洗浴间享受了热水淋浴。

sentences.en: The house allocated to them was pleasant and spacious, and well-staffed.
sentences.cn: 分配给他们的房子舒适宽敞，并配齐了工作人员。

sentences.en: The room is both light and spacious.
sentences.cn: 这间屋子既宽敞,又亮堂.

sentences.en: The room is bright and spacious.
The room is spacious and bright.
sentences.cn: 这屋子很宽敞,而且光线充足.

sentences.en: The spacious living quarters were on the second floor.
The spacious main bedroom is mainly blue.
sentences.cn: 宽敞的主卧室以蓝色为主色调。

sentences.en: Their dining room is very spacious.
Then I was put in a spacious sunny room.
sentences.cn: 进到一间充满了阳光的大屋子里.

sentences.en: This room is light and spacious.
With the white walls reflecting the light, the room looks bright and spacious.
sentences.cn: 白墙反光, 屋里显得很敞亮.

trans.tran_cn: 宽敞的，广阔的，（知识）广博的
trans.tran_en: a spacious house, room etc is large and has plenty of space to move around in
